00008 #ifndef POWER_LAW_H_
00009 #define POWER_LAW_H_
00010 
00011 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
00012  * Declaration and definition of the invariant mass generator according to       *
00013  *                                                                               *
00014  *                              g(s)~1/|s-m^2|^nu                                *
00015  *                                                                               *
00016  * where nu can be any number. If larger then 1 however, the density contains a  *
00017  * non-integrable pole at s=m^2 and bounds should be chosen not to contain this  *
00018  * singularity.                                                                  *
00019  *                                                                               *
00020  * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00021 
00022 #include <sstream>
00023 #include <Camgen/logging.h>
00024 #include <Camgen/pltstream.h>
00025 #include <Camgen/inv_gen.h>
00026 
00027 namespace Camorra
00028 {
00029     /* Momentum channel class template generating invariant masses according to
00030      * a power-law distribution. */
00031     
00032     template<class value_t,class rng_t>class pl_s_generator: public inversion_s_generator< value_t,rng_t,pl_s_generator<value_t,rng_t> >
00033     {
00034         friend class s_integrator<value_t,rng_t>;
00035         typedef inversion_s_generator< value_t,rng_t,pl_s_generator<value_t,rng_t> > direct_base_type;
00036         typedef s_generator<value_t,rng_t> base_type;
00037 
00038         public:
00039 
00040             enum exponent_type
00041             {
00042                 positive,
00043                 zero,
00044                 negative_integrable,
00045                 logarithmic,
00046                 negative
00047             };
00048 
00049             /* Type definitions: */
00050 
00051             typedef value_t value_type;
00052             typedef rng_t rn_engine;
00053             typedef random_number_stream<value_type,rng_t> rn_stream;
00054 
00055             /* Public data members: */
00056             /*----------------------*/
00057 
00058             /* Offset and exponent adresses: */
00059 
00060             const value_type* const m;
00061             const value_type* const nu;
00062 
00063             /* Constructors: */
00064             /*---------------*/
00065             
00066             /* Default constructor: */
00067 
00068             pl_s_generator(const value_type* m_,const value_type* nu_):m(m_),nu(nu_)
00069             {
00070                 refresh_params();
00071                 this->refresh_s_min();
00072                 this->refresh_s_max();
00073             }
00074             
00075             /* Constructor with inveriant mass pointer argument. */
00076             
00077             pl_s_generator(value_type* s_,const value_type* m_,const value_type* nu_):direct_base_type(s_),m(m_),nu(nu_)
00078             {
00079                 refresh_params();
00080                 this->refresh_s_min();
00081                 this->refresh_s_max();
00082             }
00083 
00084             /* Copy constructor: */
00085 
00086             pl_s_generator(const pl_s_generator<value_t,rng_t>& other):direct_base_type(other),m(other.m),nu(other.nu),exp_t(other.exp_t),nu_inv(other.nu_inv),mm(other.mm){}
00087 
00088             /* Public modifiers: */
00089             /*-------------------*/
00090 
00091             /* Updates the internal data from the current values of the mass and
00092              * width pointers. */
00093 
00094             bool refresh_params()
00095             {
00096                 if(nu==NULL)
00097                 {
00098                     exp_t=zero;
00099                     this->min_cumulant_lim=(value_type)0;
00100                     this->max_cumulant_lim=std::numeric_limits<value_type>::infinity();
00101                 }
00102                 else
00103                 {
00104                     if(*nu>(value_type)1)
00105                     {
00106                         exp_t=negative;
00107                         this->min_cumulant_lim=(value_type)0;
00108                         this->max_cumulant_lim=(value_type)0;
00109                     }
00110                     if(*nu==(value_type)1)
00111                     {
00112                         exp_t=logarithmic;
00113                         this->min_cumulant_lim=(value_type)0;
00114                         this->max_cumulant_lim=std::numeric_limits<value_type>::infinity();
00115                     }
00116                     if(*nu<(value_type)1 and *nu>(value_type)0)
00117                     {
00118                         exp_t=negative_integrable;
00119                         this->min_cumulant_lim=(value_type)0;
00120                         this->max_cumulant_lim=std::numeric_limits<value_type>::infinity();
00121                     }
00122                     if(*nu==(value_type)0)
00123                     {
00124                         exp_t=zero;
00125                         this->min_cumulant_lim=(value_type)0;
00126                         this->max_cumulant_lim=std::numeric_limits<value_type>::infinity();
00127                     }
00128                     if(*nu<(value_type)0)
00129                     {
00130                         exp_t=positive;
00131                         this->min_cumulant_lim=(value_type)0;
00132                         this->max_cumulant_lim=std::numeric_limits<value_type>::infinity();
00133                     }
00134                 }
00135                 nu_inv=(value_type)1/((value_type)1-exp());
00136                 mm=(m==NULL)?(value_type)0:((*m)*(*m));
00137                 return (this->refresh_s_min() and this->refresh_s_max());
00138             }
00139 
00140             /* Public const methods: */
00141             /*-----------------------*/
00142             
00143             /* Clone method implementation: */
00144 
00145             pl_s_generator<value_t,rng_t>* clone() const
00146             {
00147                 return new pl_s_generator<value_t,rng_t>(*this);
00148             }
00149 
00150             /* Returns the mass value. */
00151 
00152             value_type mass() const
00153             {
00154                 return (m==NULL)?(value_type)0:(*m);
00155             }
00156 
00157             /* Returns the mass-squared value. */
00158 
00159             value_type mass2() const
00160             {
00161                 return mm;
00162             }
00163         
00164             /* Returns the exponent value. */
00165 
00166             value_type exp() const
00167             {
00168                 return (nu==NULL)?(value_type)0:(*nu);
00169             }
00170 
00171             /* Probability density function. */
00172 
00173             value_type pdf(const value_type& s) const
00174             {
00175                 return (nu==NULL)?(value_type)1:std::pow(std::abs(s-mm),-*nu);
00176             }
00177 
00178             /* Cumulator distribution function. */
00179 
00180             value_type cdf(const value_type& s) const
00181             {
00182                 switch(exp_t)
00183                 {
00184                     case zero:
00185                         return s;
00186                     case logarithmic:
00187                         return (s<mm)?(-std::log(mm-s)):std::log(s-mm);
00188                     default:
00189                         return (s<mm)?(-nu_inv*std::pow(mm-s,(value_type)1-*nu)):(nu_inv*std::pow(s-mm,(value_type)1-*nu));
00190                 }
00191             }
00192 
00193             /* Inverse of the cumulator. */
00194 
00195             value_type inverse_cdf(const value_type& rho) const
00196             {
00197                 switch(exp_t)
00198                 {
00199                     case zero:
00200                         return rho;
00201                     case logarithmic:
00202                         return ((this->s_min()>mm)?(mm+std::exp(rho)):((this->s_max()<mm)?(mm-std::exp(-rho)):mm));
00203                     default:
00204                         return ((rho/nu_inv)>(value_type)0)?(mm+std::pow(rho/nu_inv,nu_inv)):(mm-std::pow(-rho/nu_inv,nu_inv));
00205                 }
00206             }
00207 
00208             /* Double-dispatch integrator functions. */
00209             
00210             value_type integrate_with(const s_generator<value_t,rng_t>* gen,const value_type& sqrts) const
00211             {
00212                 return gen->integrate_with(this,sqrts);
00213             }
00214             value_type integrate_with(const BW_s_generator<value_t,rng_t>* gen,const value_type& sqrts) const
00215             {
00216                 return s_integrator<value_t,rng_t>::integrate(gen,this,sqrts);
00217             }
00218             value_type integrate_with(const pl_s_generator<value_t,rng_t>* gen,const value_type& sqrts) const
00219             {
00220                 typedef pl_s_generator<value_t,rng_t> type;
00221                 return s_integrator<value_t,rng_t>::template integrate<type,type>(static_cast<const direct_base_type*>(this),static_cast<const direct_base_type*>(gen),sqrts);
00222             }
00223             value_type integrate_with(const uni_s_generator<value_t,rng_t>* gen,const value_type& sqrts) const
00224             {
00225                 return s_integrator<value_t,rng_t>::integrate(this,gen,sqrts);
00226             }
00227             value_type integrate_with(const Dd_s_generator<value_t,rng_t>* gen,const value_type& sqrts) const
00228             {
00229                 typedef pl_s_generator<value_t,rng_t> type;
00230                 return s_integrator<value_type,rng_t>::template integrate<type>(static_cast<const direct_base_type*>(this),gen,sqrts);
00231             }
00232 
00233             /* Serialization: */
00234             /*----------------*/
00235 
00236             /* Printing method: */
00237 
00238             std::ostream& print(std::ostream& os) const
00239             {
00240                 os<<"pl("<<mass()<<','<<exp()<<')';
00241                 return os;
00242             }
00243 
00244             /* Outputs the type of the generator. */
00245 
00246             std::string type() const
00247             {
00248                 return "pl";
00249             }
00250 
00251             /* Outputs the detailed type of the generator. */
00252 
00253             std::string detailed_type() const
00254             {
00255                 std::stringstream ss;
00256                 ss<<"pl("<<mass()<<','<<exp()<<')';
00257                 return ss.str();
00258             }
00259 
00260             /* Plotting utility method. */
00261 
00262             function_stream* pdf_plot(const value_type& x) const
00263             {
00264                 value_type n=x/this->norm;
00265                 std::ostringstream sstrm;
00266                 switch(exp_t)
00267                 {
00268                     case positive:
00269                         sstrm<<n<<"*abs(x-"<<mm<<")**"<<(-*nu);
00270                         break;
00271                     case zero:
00272                         sstrm<<n;
00273                         break;
00274                     case negative_integrable:
00275                         sstrm<<n<<"/abs(x-"<<mm<<")**"<<*nu;
00276                         break;
00277                     case logarithmic:
00278                         sstrm<<n<<"/abs(x-"<<mm<<")";
00279                         break;
00280                     default:
00281                         sstrm<<n<<"/abs(x-"<<mm<<")**"<<*nu;
00282                 }
00283                 function_stream* result=new function_stream(sstrm.str());
00284                 result->title="density";
00285                 result->style="lines";
00286                 return result;
00287             }
00288 
00289         protected:
00290 
00291             /* Normalisation refresher. */
00292 
00293             void refresh_norm()
00294             {
00295                 if((exp_t==logarithmic or exp_t==negative) and mm>this->s_min() and mm<this->s_max())
00296                 {
00297                     this->norm=std::numeric_limits<value_type>::infinity();
00298                 }
00299                 else
00300                 {
00301                     this->norm=std::abs(this->max_cumulant-this->min_cumulant);
00302                 }
00303             }
00304 
00305         private:
00306 
00307             /* Extra parameters: */
00308 
00309             exponent_type exp_t;
00310             value_type nu_inv,mm;
00311     };
00312 }
00313 
00314 #endif /*POWER_LAW_H_*/
